mapper.select: select tmi.match_id, tmi.game_variation, tmi.game_version, tmi.tft_set_number, tmi.game_length, tmi.game_datetime, tmi.queue_id, tmdp.match_participant_seq as tmdp_match_participant_seq, tmdp.match_id as tmdp_match_id, tmdp.puuid as tmdp_puuid, gold_left as tmdp_gold_left, tmdp.last_round as tmdp_last_round, tmdp.level as tmdp_level, tmdp.placement as tmdp_placement, tmdp.players_eliminated as tmdp_players_eliminated, tmdp.time_eliminated as tmdp_time_eliminated, tmdp.total_damage_to_players as tmdp_total_damage_to_players, tpt.match_participant_seq as tpt_match_participant_seq, tpt.name as tpt_name, tpt.num_units as tpt_num_units, tpt.style as tpt_style, tpt.tier_current as tpt_tier_current, tpt.tier_total as tpt_tier_total, tpu.match_participant_seq as tpu_match_participant_seq, tpu.character_id as tpu_character_id, tpu.chosen as tpu_chosen, tpu.name as tpu_name, tpu.rarity as tpu_rarity, tpu.tier as tpu_tier, tpc.match_participant_seq as tpc_match_participant_seq, tpc.content_ID as tpc_content_ID, tpc.skin_ID as tpc_skin_ID, tpc.species as tpc_species from tbl_match_info tmi inner join tbl_match_detail_participant tmdp on tmdp.match_id = tmi.match_id inner join tbl_participant_trait tpt on tmdp.match_participant_seq = tpt.match_participant_seq inner join tbl_participant_unit tpu on tmdp.match_participant_seq = tpu.match_participant_seq inner join tbl_participant_companion tpc on tmdp.match_participant_seq = tpc.match_participant_seq WHERE tmi.match_id = #{match_id}

select match_participant_seq, match_id, puuid, gold_left, last_round, level, placement, players_eliminated, time_eliminated, total_damage_to_players from tbl_match_detail_participant where match_id = #{match_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_summoner (id, accountId, puuid, profileIconId, revisionDate, name, summonerLevel) values (#{id}, #{accountId}, #{puuid}, #{profileIconId}, #{revisionDate}, #{summonerName}, #{summonerLevel});

insert into tbl_match_info(match_id, game_version, game_variation, tft_set_number, game_length, game_datetime, queue_id) values (#{match_id}, #{game_version}, #{game_variation}, #{tft_set_number}, #{game_length}, #{game_datetime}, #{queue_id})

insert into tbl_match_detail_participant (match_id, puuid, gold_left, last_round, level, placement, players_eliminated, time_eliminated, total_damage_to_players) values (#{match_id}, #{puuid}, #{gold_left}, #{last_round}, #{level}, #{placement}, #{players_eliminated}, #{time_eliminated}, #{total_damage_to_players})
insert into tbl_participant_companion (match_participant_seq, content_ID, skin_ID, species) values (#{match_participant_seq}, #{content_ID}, #{skin_ID}, #{species})

insert into tbl_participant_trait (match_participant_seq, name, num_units, style, tier_current, tier_total) values (#{match_participant_seq}, #{name}, #{num_units}, #{style}, #{tier_current}, #{tier_total})
insert into tbl_participant_unit(match_participant_seq, character_id, chosen, name, rarity, tier) values (#{match_participant_seq}, #{character_id}, #{chosen}, #{name}, #{rarity}, #{tier})
